dublin_core.dcvalue: Steve Knight, Communications Manager, MicroEnsure, Email: steve.knight@microensure.com
Ghana, Zambia, Burkina Faso, Nigeria, Niger, Madagascar, Kenya, Malawi

MicroEnsure and Airtel launched a joint endeavor by which their customers are able to earn free insurance as long as they spent a minimum amount of airtime. Mobile money transactions transmit cash to patients who spend 3 nights or more in any hospital.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:08Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 airtel_insurance_with_microensure.pdf: 283868 bytes, checksum: 7d393671fc70053acbf06551f225aaab (MD5)
Financial transactions and incentives, Inpatient hospitalization
